alert.note: Alert for Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 29 at 11:16AM PDT until March 29 at 5:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM PDT THIS AFTERNOON ABOVE 7000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy wet snow above 7000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 12 inches. Winds gusting as high as 65 mph. * WHERE...Spring Mountains including Mount Charleston. * WHEN...Until 5 PM PDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult due to slick and snow covered roads. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions will make travel very hazardous or impossible. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
